subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Claude Giroux wrapped up a dominant series with his sixth goal, and Ilya Bryzgalov had an outstanding effort in net as Philadelphia won its opening-round series in six games.
snippet: Claude Giroux wrapped up a dominant series with his sixth goal, and Ilya Bryzgalov had an outstanding effort in net as Philadelphia won its opening-round series in six games.
